titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives and ranking Members on certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives and ranking Members on certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary:
This resolution elects specified Members to the House Committees on (1) Armed Services, and (2) Transportation and Infrastructure.
In addition, the resolution ranks specified Members on the House Committees on (1) Science, Space, and Technology; and (2) Veterans Affairs.
